attrs.name: background-color
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is #d9d9

attrs.name: color
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is #ffffff.

attrs.name: message-type
attrs.desc: Message type details|basic is optional. ;The value of this attribute can be details or basic
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is details.

attrs.name: message-upper-limit
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 0

attrs.name: min
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: type
attrs.desc: Avatar type. The options are icon, image, and label. ;The value of this attribute can be icon / image / label
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is label.

attrs.name: value
attrs.desc: If type is set to icon, it indicates the icon class name. If type is set to label, it indicates the font string. If type is set to image, it indicates the resource path.
